title: Jason Biggs 👍
description:
Jason Biggs (American Pie, Orange Is the New Black) talks about getting his start during the 90s boom of teen comedies, his wife’s fascination with his ex-girlfriends, and how he ended up taking a selfie in Justin’s bathroom while Justin wasn’t home.
